content: --चर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} flying, moving in the air. (--रः or खेचरः {1} a bird. {2} a cloud. {3} the sun. {4} the wind. {5} a demon. {6} an aerial spirit. {7} a Gandharva or Vidyādhara. {8} a planet. {9} mercury or quicksilver. 10 a sign of the zodiac. (--री {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} खेचरी {1} a semi-divine female able to fly. {2} an epithet of Durgā.
